desc.en: The first track in Blue Archive OST, as well as the very song played when logging in.
desc.jp: The first track in Blue Archive OST, as well as the very song played when logging in.
desc.thai: The first track in Blue Archive OST, as well as the very song played when logging in.
desc.ko: The first track in Blue Archive OST, as well as the very song played when logging in.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第一首曲子，也是在登录界面会播放的曲子。
desc.zh_tw: The first track in Blue Archive OST, as well as the very song played when logging in.

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.thai: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.ko: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_tw: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.thai: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.ko: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。
desc.zh_tw: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.

realname.zh_cn: 不变的平凡 钢琴版

desc.en: The 87th track in Blue Archive, known for its usage when Himifu delivered her speech on the topics of "Youth" and "Our Story".
desc.jp: The 87th track in Blue Archive, known for its usage when Himifu delivered her speech on the topics of "Youth" and "Our Story".
desc.thai: The 87th track in Blue Archive, known for its usage when Himifu delivered her speech on the topics of "Youth" and "Our Story".
desc.ko: The 87th track in Blue Archive, known for its usage when Himifu delivered her speech on the topics of "Youth" and "Our Story".
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第86首曲子，其因在“日步美演讲”时使用而非常出名。
desc.zh_tw: The 87th track in Blue Archive, known for its usage when Himifu delivered her speech on the topics of "Youth" and "Our Story".
